actionUnits.condition: Manual collision simulation for negative path: Fire OnTriggerEnter on collider_porte (BoxCollider id: 6650539076773276978, isTrigger=1) with any Collider whose tag != 'Objet1'. This validates no animation plays and no deactivation occurs when tag does not match. No UnityEvent m_Calls present in scene meta.

Manual collision simulation for positive path: Fire OnTriggerEnter on collider_porte (BoxCollider id: 6650539076773276978) with a Collider tagged 'Objet1' that has component SnapToTrigger. Expected: DoorOpenScript (MonoBehaviour fileID: 8870310304005890639) calls SnapToTrigger.Snap(transform.position), plays Animator (fileID: 1075516723) state 'DoorOpen' at layer 0, time 0, then disables collider_porte and sets openTrigger=false. No UnityEvent m_Calls present.

Mapping confirmation only (no manual call): MonoBehaviour (fileID: 5374773463603666079; script GUID: 2723dba42bd113044ad231906b498006) is SnapToTrigger attached to Cube_salle1 (Has_Rigidbody=true; BoxCollider id: 1659405682678754060). Driving the cube into collider_porte via the Transform step above should automatically fire OnTriggerEnter, which invokes SnapToTrigger.Snap() and plays the door animation; no direct public no-arg methods exist to call manually.

MonoBehaviour id=697146254 (m_Script guid=82aa235159f620648803cf53217af1e5) matches class 'room2'. Serialized doorAnim references fileID=521131961. Calling public no-arg methods SetSphereCheck/SetCubeCheck/SetPyramidCheck sets internal flags; Update() opens the door via doorAnim.Play("DoorOpen",0,0.0f) once all three are true and doorOpen is false.
Progress second condition for room2: set CubeChecked true. Expect no door animation yet unless all three checks are true.

Finalize all checks for room2 by setting PyramidChecked true. Expected behavior: in the next Update(), since SphereChecked && CubeChecked && PyramidChecked && !doorOpen, the script sets doorOpen=true and calls doorAnim.Play("DoorOpen", 0, 0.0f).

MonoBehaviour fileID 3953368309659336407 (guid b2dd7fabdb14fca498bd9e0def11ab19) is Unity.VRTemplate.AnchorVisuals on PrefabInstance 'Teleport Anchor'. Trigger OnAnchorEnter to simulate teleport interactor hover enter: expects fade animation to play forward from start and arrow tween to target height using m_ArrowAnimationDuration=0.375 and the serialized AnimationCurve.

Same MonoBehaviour (fileID 3953368309659336407). Trigger OnAnchorExit to simulate teleport interactor hover exit: expects fade animation to play in reverse at 1.5x speed and arrow tween back to height 0 per serialized AnimationCurve.
